MGR:Lullaby.NAME: Lullaby
MGR:Lullaby.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL mgr:Ending: Apply !M! Weak to all creatures.
MGR:Lullaby.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL mgr:Ending: Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

MGR:EastOfTimeline.NAME: East of Timeline
MGR:EastOfTimeline.DESCRIPTION: Generate !M! mgr:AttackNote. NL If this is the *first or *last card you played in a combat, *permanently increase the number by 1. NL Exhaustive 2

MGR:GazeLock.NAME: Gaze Lock
MGR:GazeLock.DESCRIPTION: For each *Debuff the target has, draw 1 card and apply !M! mgr:Gaze.

MGR:LAB01.NAME: LAB=01
MGR:LAB01.DESCRIPTION: When in hand, *record each triggered note and reset upon entering the discard pile. When played, use the effects of these notes. NL *Retain for !M! turns. Exhaust.

MGR:HarmonyForm.NAME: Harmony Form
MGR:HarmonyForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The *leftmost and *rightmost notes trigger an additional time.
MGR:HarmonyForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The *leftmost and *rightmost notes trigger an additional time.

MGR:Stereophonic.NAME: Stereophonic
MGR:Stereophonic.DESCRIPTION: mgr:AttackNote gains half block. NL mgr:DefendNote deals damage to a random enemy.
MGR:Stereophonic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: mgr:AttackNote gains half block. NL mgr:DefendNote deals damage to a random enemy. NL mgr:DrawNote gains double block and deal double damage to all enemies.

MGR:AdjustTempo.NAME: Adjust Tempo
MGR:AdjustTempo.DESCRIPTION: Generate !M! mgr:DrawNote. NL After the next mgr:Chord, generate the triggered notes again. NL Exhaustive 2
MGR:AdjustTempo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Generate !M! mgr:DrawNote. NL After the next mgr:Chord, generate the triggered notes again.

MGR:StageWarmUp.NAME: Stage Warm Up
MGR:StageWarmUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! mgr:Forte. NL mgr:Awaken: add another *StageWarmUp into hand.

MGR:ScaryGlare.NAME: Scary Glare
MGR:ScaryGlare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL apply !M! mgr:Gaze. NL For each 2 mgr:Gaze the target has, apply 1 additional mgr:Gaze.

MGR:IndifferentLook.NAME: Indifferent Look
MGR:IndifferentLook.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply or trigger mgr:Gaze, gain !M! block.

MGR:MasterSpark.NAME: Master Spark
MGR:MasterSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Lose !M! mgr:Forte.

MGR:Obakenoukenerai.NAME: Obake no uke nerai
MGR:Obakenoukenerai.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Generate !M! mgr:GhostNote. NL mgr:Awaken: Generate another. Exhaust.

MGR:MaguroBash.NAME: Maguro Bash
MGR:MaguroBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage by !M! for each mgr:Chord performed this turn.

MGR:Unison.NAME: Unison
MGR:Unison.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, mgr:Improvise !M! .
MGR:Unison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, mgr:Improvise !M! .

MGR:MaguroAssault.NAME: Maguro Assault
MGR:MaguroAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage by !M! for each mgr:Chord performed this turn. NL mgr:Ending: Double the damage NL mgr:Awaken: Double the damage

MGR:Rehearsal.NAME: Rehearsal
MGR:Rehearsal.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each card drawn, generate the *corresponding note. NL Exhaust.
MGR:Rehearsal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each card drawn, generate the *corresponding note.

MGR:DarkDiffuse.NAME: Dark Diffuse
MGR:DarkDiffuse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Every enemy loses !M! Strength this turn for each *Debuff it has.

MGR:Hallucination.NAME: Hallucination
MGR:Hallucination.DESCRIPTION: Transfer your random *Debuff to the target. NL mgr:Awaken: Transfer all *Debuffs instead. NL Exhaust.
MGR:Hallucination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transfer your random *Debuff to the target. NL mgr:Awaken: Transfer all *Debuffs instead. NL Retain. Exhaust.

MGR:Peek.NAME: Peek
MGR:Peek.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! mgr:Gaze. NL mgr:Awaken: Apply once again.

MGR:GazeFromTheShadow.NAME: From the Shadow
MGR:GazeFromTheShadow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the target's each turn, apply !M! mgr:Gaze to it. NL Exhaust.

MGR:ResonanceForm.NAME: Resonance Form
MGR:ResonanceForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you draw, play, discard or exhaust the !M!th card, gain its mgr:TempCopy. *NonStackable.
MGR:ResonanceForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw, play, discard or exhaust the !M!th card, gain its mgr:TempCopy. *NonStackable.

MGR:Romp.NAME: Romp
MGR:Romp.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Confused into your hand. NL Exhaust.
MGR:Romp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Confused+ into your hand. NL Retain. Exhaust.

MGR:Yazyuutokasu.NAME: Feral
MGR:Yazyuutokasu.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, discard a random card with the *lowest cost and add a *Confused into hand.
MGR:Yazyuutokasu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, discard a random card with the *lowest cost and add a *Confused into hand.

MGR:MaguroCleave.NAME: Maguro Cleave
MGR:MaguroCleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies.  NL Increase the damage by !M! for each mgr:Chord performed this turn.

MGR:SongOfSubmersion.NAME: Song of Submersion
MGR:SongOfSubmersion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL At the end of next !M! turns, all enemies lose 1 Strength. Exhaust.

MGR:StardustLaser.NAME: Stardust Laser
MGR:StardustLaser.DESCRIPTION: mgr:Starry. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

MGR:Kimitomitahosizora.NAME: Counting Stars
MGR:Kimitomitahosizora.DESCRIPTION: mgr:Starry. Scry !M! . NL The chosen cards are conceived as discarded from hand.

MGR:Futariboshi.NAME: Our Stars
MGR:Futariboshi.DESCRIPTION: mgr:Starry. NL Discard up to !M! cards, generate equivalent mgr:EnergyNote.

MGR:DizzyAndGiddy.NAME: Dizzy and Giddy
MGR:DizzyAndGiddy.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards to generate the *corresponding notes. NL If at least 2 cards are discarded, draw 1 card.
MGR:DizzyAndGiddy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards to generate the *corresponding notes. NL If at least 3 cards are discarded, draw 2 cards.

MGR:Swallow.NAME: Swallow
MGR:Swallow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL If the target is *Minion, kill it and heal triple instead.

MGR:Nocturnal.NAME: Nocturnal
MGR:Nocturnal.DESCRIPTION: Add a random *Curse into your draw pile. NL For each *Curse in draw, discard, exhaust pile and hand, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

MGR:TheCursed.NAME: The Cursed
MGR:TheCursed.DESCRIPTION: Add a random *Curse into draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a *Curse, draw 1 card and generate 1 mgr:ArtifactNote.
MGR:TheCursed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Add a random *Curse into draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a *Curse, draw 1 card and generate 1 mgr:ArtifactNote.

MGR:TinyOrchestra.NAME: Tiny Orchestra
MGR:TinyOrchestra.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to all enemies for each *type of note generated this turn.

MGR:MetalGear.NAME: Metal Gear
MGR:MetalGear.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Dexterity, Gain !M! *Metallicize. NL mgr:Awaken: Gain additional 3 . Exhaust.
MGR:MetalGear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Dexterity, Gain !M! *Metallicize. NL mgr:Awaken: Gain additional 4 . Exhaust.

MGR:Marionette.NAME: Marionette
MGR:Marionette.DESCRIPTION: mgr:ConceivedAsStatus. NL All enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Also do effect when discarded. Exhaust.

MGR:FieryPerformance.NAME: Fiery
MGR:FieryPerformance.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you have !M! in your hand. NL Discard a random card with the *lowest cost.

MGR:ChristmasGift.NAME: Christmas Gift
MGR:ChristmasGift.DESCRIPTION: Gain one with a specific probability: Add a random *Potion to the reward; Gain !M! *Gold; *Upgrade a random card in deck. Exhaust.
MGR:ChristmasGift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain one with a *better probability: Add a random *Potion to the reward; Gain !M! *Gold; *Upgrade a random card in deck. Exhaust.

MGR:BroomStrike.NAME: Broom Strike
MGR:BroomStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and generate 1 mgr:AttackNote. NL If mgr:Chord is performed this turn, gain !B! block and generate 1 mgr:DefendNote.

MGR:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
MGR:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL For each card exhausted, gain !B! block. NL If exhausted at least !M! cards, gain 1 mgr:Forte. NL Exhaust.
MGR:Shatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL For each card exhausted, gain !B! block. NL If exhausted at least !M! cards, gain 1 mgr:Forte. NL Exhaustive 2

MGR:Strafe.NAME: Strafe
MGR:Strafe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Generate equivalent mgr:AttackNote.

MGR:NowhereToHide.NAME: Nowhere to Hide
MGR:NowhereToHide.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! mgr:Gaze to all enemies and trigger mgr:Gaze once. NL If killed any, Repeat this.

MGR:ReconvertingCharm.NAME: Reconvert
MGR:ReconvertingCharm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return the last *non-exhaust card you played to hand. NL mgr:Awaken: Gain its mgr:TempCopy.

MGR:DragonClaw.NAME: Dragon Claw
MGR:DragonClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply equivalent Poison. NL After played or discarded !M! times, exhaust and add *DragonBite into discard pile.
MGR:DragonClaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply equivalent Poison. NL After played or discarded !M! times, exhaust and add *DragonBite+ into discard pile.

MGR:FrenziedDragonBite.NAME: DragonBite
MGR:FrenziedDragonBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equals to !M! times the target's total *Debuff amount. NL Double its *Debuff. NL Exhaust.

MGR:AccurateShooting.NAME: Accurate Shooting
MGR:AccurateShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL mgr:Ending: Double the damage

MGR:Siren.NAME: Siren
MGR:Siren.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn: Every enemy loses HP equals to its total *Debuff amount; Gain !M! block for each *Debuff that exists.

MGR:VocalPreparation.NAME: Vocal Preparation
MGR:VocalPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Generate !M! mgr:DefendNote. NL Add a *Climax! into your discard pile. NL mgr:Awaken:Into draw pile instead. NL Exhaust.
MGR:VocalPreparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Generate !M! mgr:DefendNote. NL Add a *Climax!+ into your discard pile. NL mgr:Awaken:Into draw pile instead. NL Retain. Exhaust.

MGR:Climax.NAME: Climax!
MGR:Climax.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! mgr:Forte and generate double notes this turn. NL Exhaust.
MGR:Climax.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! mgr:Forte and generate double notes this turn. NL Retain. Exhaust.

MGR:MyReflection.NAME: In the Mirror
MGR:MyReflection.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card with the *lowest cost. NL A random card with the *highest cost reduces its cost by [E] [E] this turn.
MGR:MyReflection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card with the *lowest cost. NL A random card with the *highest cost reduces its cost by [E] [E] [E] this turn.

MGR:FolkRhymes.NAME: Folk Rhymes
MGR:FolkRhymes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever mgr:Chord is performed, gain !M! block.
MGR:FolkRhymes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever mgr:Chord is performed, gain !M! block.

MGR:Dexterous.NAME: Dexterous
MGR:Dexterous.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL mgr:Ending: Draw !M! card. NL mgr:Starting: Gain [E] next turn.
MGR:Dexterous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL mgr:Ending: Draw !M! cards. NL mgr:Starting: Gain [E] [E] next turn.

MGR:Salivate.NAME: Salivate
MGR:Salivate.DESCRIPTION: Damage from mgr:Gaze is affected by Vulnerable. NL Whenever a *non-Minion enemy is killed by mgr:Gaze, raise your Max HP by !M! .

MGR:SummoningCharm.NAME: Restore
MGR:SummoningCharm.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your notes. For each note removed, gain a random card that *corresponds to it. Exhaust.
MGR:SummoningCharm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all your notes. For each note removed, gain a random *Upgraded card that *corresponds to it. Exhaust.

MGR:SunDescending.NAME: Sun Dial
MGR:SunDescending.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When discarded or exhausted, deal !D! damage to all enemies and reset. NL Raise the damage by !M! whenever you discard or exhaust a card.

MGR:FourEyes.NAME: Four Eyes
MGR:FourEyes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply *Debuff (Excluding mgr:Gaze) to an enemy, apply equivalent mgr:Gaze.
MGR:FourEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you apply *Debuff (Excluding mgr:Gaze) to an enemy, apply equivalent mgr:Gaze.

MGR:Frighten.NAME: Frighten
MGR:Frighten.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! mgr:Gaze. NL If target has mgr:Gaze, apply 2 Vulnerable. If target has Vulnerable, apply additional !M! mgr:Gaze.
MGR:Frighten.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! mgr:Gaze. NL If target has mgr:Gaze, apply 3 Vulnerable. If target has Vulnerable, apply additional !M! mgr:Gaze.

MGR:Brilliant.NAME: Brilliant
MGR:Brilliant.DESCRIPTION: Notes generated by mgr:Improvise become slightly better and include mgr:EnergyNote. NL At the start of your turn, mgr:Improvise !M!.

MGR:LightUpTheStage.NAME: Light Up
MGR:LightUpTheStage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL When played, raise the damage by 3. When discarded, raise the count by 2.

MGR:EchoPhantom.NAME: Echo Phantom
MGR:EchoPhantom.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card. Choose !M! card in discard pile, put its copy on top of draw pile. NL mgr:Awaken: Add an extra copy into hand. Exhaust.
MGR:EchoPhantom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card. Choose !M! card in discard pile, put its copy on top of draw pile. NL mgr:Awaken: Add an extra copy into hand. Exhaustive 2

MGR:IntertwinedTimbres.NAME: Intertwined Timbres
MGR:IntertwinedTimbres.DESCRIPTION: mgr:Improvise !M! . NL Gain !B! block for each *type of note generated this turn.

MGR:Reflexivity.NAME: Reflexivity
MGR:Reflexivity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Move !M! cards from your discard pile to the *bottom of draw pile. NL mgr:Awaken: To the *top of draw pile instead.

MGR:TheEyeBehind.NAME: The Eye Behind
MGR:TheEyeBehind.DESCRIPTION: If the target doesn't have *Weak, apply 2, otherwise apply 1. NL Also do this for *Vulnerable and mgr:Gaze. Exhaust.
MGR:TheEyeBehind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the target doesn't have *Weak, apply 2, otherwise apply 3. NL Also do this for *Vulnerable and mgr:Gaze. Exhaust.

MGR:StarryDrift.NAME: Starry Drift
MGR:StarryDrift.DESCRIPTION: mgr:Starry. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard 1 card.
MGR:StarryDrift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: mgr:Starry. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard 2 cards.

MGR:HakkeroCharge.NAME: Hakkero Charge
MGR:HakkeroCharge.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, generate !M! mgr:AttackNote whenever you play a card. NL mgr:Awaken: Gain 1 mgr:Forte next turn. Exhaust.
MGR:HakkeroCharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, generate !M! mgr:AttackNote whenever you play a card. NL mgr:Awaken: Gain 1 mgr:Forte next turn. NL Retain. Exhaust.

MGR:RapidClaw.NAME: Rapid Claw
MGR:RapidClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and generate 1 mgr:AttackNote. NL mgr:Starting or mgr:Ending: If the base damage is not 0, gain a copy with it reduced by !M!.

MGR:BurnsRed.NAME: Burns Red
MGR:BurnsRed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: mgr:AttackNote damages all enemies. NL Generate !M! mgr:AttackNote.

MGR:TheBurningSun.NAME: The Burning Sun
MGR:TheBurningSun.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. Draw that many cards next turn. NL mgr:Awaken: Gain their mgr:TempCopy instead.

MGR:Finale.NAME: Finale
MGR:Finale.DESCRIPTION: Discard all *non-Attack cards in hand. Generate !M! mgr:AttackNote for each. NL Ethereal.

MGR:Masterful.NAME: Masterful
MGR:Masterful.DESCRIPTION: For *every *type of note, randomly draw a card that *corresponds to it. Reduce their cost by [E] this turn. Exhaust.
MGR:Masterful.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL For *every *type of note, randomly draw a card that *corresponds to it. Reduce their cost by [E] this turn. Exhaust.

MGR:GazeOfOthers.NAME: Gaze of Others
MGR:GazeOfOthers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL If the target has at least !M! mgr:Gaze, gain once more.

MGR:Casually.NAME: Casually
MGR:Casually.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Drawn: mgr:Improvise !D!  NL Discarded or exhausted: mgr:Improvise !M!
